# æœ¬åœ°çŠ¶æ€

å¦‚æœä½ éœ€è¦ç®¡ç†æœ¬åœ°æ•°æ®ï¼Œä½ å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨ apollo-link-state å’Œ @client æŒ‡ä»¤æ¥å®ç°ï¼š

export default {
  apollo: {
    hello: gql`
      query {
        hello @client {
          msg
        }
      }
    `
  },
  mounted() {
    // å˜æ›´ hello æ¶ˆæ¯
    this.$apollo
      .mutate({
        mutation: gql`
          mutation($msg: String!) {
            updateHello(message: $msg) @client
          }
        `,
        variables: {
          msg: 'hello from link-state!'
        }
      })
  }
}
